mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO phisport_activation_count (date, lianbi, wanjia,type) VALUES (DATE_FORMAT(#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d'), #{lianbi,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{wanjia,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT date, sum(lianbi) AS lianbi, sum(wanjia) AS wanjia, type FROM phisport_activation_count WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m') AND type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(dayTime, '%Y-%m') AS generateTime, SUM(dayCount) AS generateCount FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS dayTime, COUNT(1) AS dayCount, type AS type FROM `wristband` GROUP BY dayTime HAVING dayTime < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') ) b WHERE type = #{type} GROUP BY generateTime HAVING generateTime > DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER} MONTH), '%Y-%m' ) ORDER BY generateTime DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(dayTime, '%Y-%m') AS generateTime, SUM(dayCount) AS generateCount FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS dayTime, COUNT(1) AS dayCount FROM `wristband` GROUP BY dayTime HAVING dayTime < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') ) b GROUP BY generateTime HAVING generateTime > DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER} MONTH), '%Y-%m' ) ORDER BY generateTime DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%y-%m-%d') AS generateTime, COUNT(1) AS generateCount FROM `wristband` GROUP BY generateTime HAVING generateTime >= DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - #{day,jdbcType=INTEGER} DAY), '%y-%m-%d' ) AND generateTime<DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y-%m-%d') ORDER BY generateTime DESC

SELECT province AS province, COUNT(1) AS generateCount FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS dayTime, IF ( POSITION('自治区' IN province)>0, LEFT ( province, LOCATE('自治区', province) - 1 ), province ) AS province, device_type AS device_type FROM device_location_info HAVING dayTime >= DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - #{day,jdbcType=INTEGER} DAY), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND dayTime < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') ) b WHERE LENGTH(province) > 0 AND province <> 'no_location' AND province <> 'Reserved Address' AND device_type = #{type} GROUP BY LEFT (province, 2) ORDER BY generateCount DESC LIMIT #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT province AS province, COUNT(1) AS generateCount FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS dayTime, IF ( POSITION('自治区' IN province)>0, LEFT ( province, LOCATE('自治区', province) - 1 ), province ) AS province, device_type AS device_type FROM device_location_info HAVING dayTime >= DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - #{day,jdbcType=INTEGER} DAY), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND dayTime < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') ) b WHERE LENGTH(province) > 0 AND province <> 'no_location' AND province <> 'Reserved Address' AND device_type in ('w1','w2','w1p','w2p') GROUP BY LEFT (province, 2) ORDER BY generateCount DESC LIMIT #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date,'%y-%m-%d') AS date, SUM(lianbi+wanjia) AS counts FROM phisport_activation_count GROUP BY date LIMIT #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}
